title: [5.0.11] webdav nav doesn't work to root url.  did in oc4.
body:
expected behaviour

should be able to get file list and navigate around

actual behaviour
error 405 the operation couldn't be completed

steps to reproduce

using webdav nav on iphone or webdav nav lite on android:

1) set up server to go to the root directory rather than the webdav directory:   
       http://192.168.1.6/owncloud
2) sign in and get error 405 back 

3) set up server to go to the webdav directory:
      http://192.168.1.6/owncloud/remote.php/webdav
4) sign in and get connected



customer states this worked in oc4 and has not worked since upgrade to oc5.
customer tested with 5.0.10 and iphone and it fails
we tested in lab with 5.0.11 and android and it fails

as results are inconsistent, there seems to be an issue here.


server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.20","versionstring":"5.0.11"}
ubuntu
php 5.5.3

lab test with webdav nav lite version 2.0.1

-------------------------

owncloud logs show nothing
apache error logs show nothing

apache access logs show the following:


not working:
------------------------
192.168.1.36 - - [09/sep/2013:14:01:05 -0400] "propfind /owncloud511/ http/1.1" 405 579 "-" "webdav nav android/sch-i500/2.0.1"
192.168.1.36 - - [09/sep/2013:14:01:11 -0400] "propfind /owncloud511/ http/1.1" 405 579 "-" "webdav nav android/sch-i500/2.0.1"



working:
----------------
192.168.1.36 - - [09/sep/2013:14:03:05 -0400] "propfind /owncloud511/remote.php/webdav/ http/1.1" 401 810 "-" "webdav nav android/sch-i500/2.0.1"
192.168.1.36 - ser72 [09/sep/2013:14:03:05 -0400] "propfind /owncloud511/remote.php/webdav/ http/1.1" 207 1300 "-" "webdav nav android/sch-i500/2.0.1"
